rows.label: qev051504_MSG0001
rows.name:
Ho, [ST:playername ]!
Your next opponent is Slovity Pagus![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051504_MSG0002
rows.name: We fought before. I know you are fierce warrior.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051504_MSG0003
rows.name:
I just learned you were my foe.
It made wave of heat surge through body![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051504_MSG0004
rows.name:
I have been injured. Weak. But no longer.
Today I fight at full strength. You should do same.
Or I will devour you![ST:wait ]
